question: One will NOT have to pass through the Suez Canal while going from Mumbai to which of the following regions?
explanation: One will not have to pass through the Suez Canal while going from Mumbai to Suez. The Suez Canal is a sea-level waterway in Egypt, connecting the Mediterranean Sea to the Red Sea through the Isthmus of Suez. Constructed by the Suez Canal Company between 1859 and 1869, it was officially opened on 17 November 1869.
